result.title: Report and academic article manuscript on the contribution of bunker fuels to achieve the Paris Agreement goals
result.description: This deliverable will synthesise the findings of modelling the contribution ov international aviation and shipping towards achieving the objectives of the Paris Agreement Task 22 The deliverable will include a manuscript to be submitted to a peerreviewed academic journal

result.title: Report and academic article manuscripts on sectoral governance gaps and options to overcome them for industry, transport, buildings and AFOLU
result.description: The deliverable will compile for academic article manuscripts on gaps in the global climate governance landscape in each of the four sectors industry transport buildings AFOLU and ways and means to close those gaps with a view to optimizing the global governance for supporting sectoral transformations The deliverable is targeted towards an academic audience Each article manuscript will be submitted for peer review in an appropriate academic journal
